outputs.output_descr: This programme serves as an affirmation of UNV's commitment to the ongoing UN Reform process with particular focus on the eight Delivering as One pilot countries: Albania, Cape Verde, Mozambique, Pakistan, Rwanda, Tanzania, Uruguay and Vietnam. The aim is to strengthen the capacity of the eight pilot countries to integrate volunteerism into programmatic initiatives.The project capacities to help partners apply 'Volunteerism for Development' as cross-cutting development strategy and resource in joint programmes are enhanced in eight official pilot countries.   A focus will be placed on substantive engagement in UN joint programme planning, implementation, monitoring and documentation.
This project provides strategic capacity support to the UN RCOs in the DaO pilot countries by placing UN volunteers and thereby promoting volunteerism

'Volunteerism for Development' contributions to 'Delivery as One' under this project are monitored, documented and receive due recognition. This project is forms as technical assistance aspect of the programme through supporting monitoring and evaluation, programme evaluation etc.
This project provides strategic capacity support to the UN RCOs in the DaO pilot countries by placing UN volunteers and thereby promoting volunteerism

project_title: UNV Support to Delivery as One initiatives
